effects: Increase DEF and SPR by 80% for 3 turns to all allies
Increase resistance to all status effects by 100% for all allies for 3 turns
name: Angelic Ward

desc_short: Boost DEF, SPR, and poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone resistance for all allies
提高全體隊員防禦精神、中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化的耐性
아군 전체의 방어력과 정신력 상승+독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력 상승
Augmente la résistance au poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification de tous les alliés
Erhöht ABW, PSY und Res. gegen Gift, Blind, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein für alle Verb.
Aumenta DEF, ESP y la res. al ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie de todos los aliados
